author: Tanya S.
description: I appreciated that Michael got all of us to participate and found a way to engage us with entertainment and take us out of our element.

author: Nolan M.
description: The best part of the class was having an instructor passionate about what he was doing!

author: Jen S.
description: It was very interactive, and it was a comfortable environment - easy to ask questions and ask for clarification.

author: Lisa B.
description: Michael was great with funny stories, great conversation, and a sense of humor with the rest of the class.

author: Connor S.
description: I loved the activities (Legos, fixtures, group work)! This makes the class entertaining and engaging
